reviews.review: so much salt i can season a steak with this game

Опущенное издание, не рекомендую, не подходит по минимальным требованиям в описании, бывало что дают блокировку навсегда за просто так, если покупать кейсы то окуп практически не возможен, не рекомендую зная что повторяюсь.

really great competitive game! most fair and balanced fps game ever created. The battle royale however is complete poop. Never in my life would I find a battle royale that is worse than fortnite but then I played this games and I can offically say its aweful. 17 people in a lobby while its a duo game??? like how does that work there is 17 people and its duos that means duo people have an unfair advantage. Final statement: competitive mode is great, br is trash

I like this game so far, I bought the prime status and I'm having a good time. I really like the Danger Zone game mode, it's a really fresh version of a battle royale. Anyone can find enjoyment in this game, competitively or casually. 10/10
